AttackerCapabilities: Ability to analyze obfuscated JavaScript code
Programming skills to develop a custom client

Vulnerabilities: Lack of input validation for click coordinates
Use of a vulnerable version of socket.io (502 Bad Gateway issue)

Steps.Description: Obtain the session ID (SID) by making a GET request to the target endpoint.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: To interact with the game, the attacker needs a valid session ID.
StepDetails.Action: Send a GET request to the target endpoint to obtain the session ID.
StepDetails.Result: The response contains the session ID.

Steps.Description: Start the game by sending a POST request to the target endpoint with the 'start' payload.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker needs to start the game to receive the initial positions of the shapes.
StepDetails.Action: Send a POST request to the target endpoint with the 'start' payload.
StepDetails.Result: The response contains the initial positions of the shapes.

Steps.Description: Repeatedly send GET requests to the target endpoint to retrieve the positions of the shapes and the current score.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: To make informed clicks, the attacker needs to continuously retrieve the positions of the shapes and the current score.
StepDetails.Action: Send GET requests to the target endpoint to retrieve the positions of the shapes and the current score.
StepDetails.Result: The responses contain the positions of the shapes and the current score.

Steps.Description: Calculate the best click coordinates based on the positions of the shapes.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: To maximize the score, the attacker needs to calculate the best click coordinates based on the positions of the shapes.
StepDetails.Action: Calculate the best click coordinates based on the positions of the shapes.
StepDetails.Result: The best click coordinates are determined.

Steps.Description: Send a POST request to the target endpoint with the calculated click coordinates to make a click.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: To interact with the game, the attacker needs to send click coordinates to make a click.
StepDetails.Action: Send a POST request to the target endpoint with the calculated click coordinates.
StepDetails.Result: The response confirms the success of the click.

Steps.Description: Repeat steps 3-5 until the game ends or the flag is obtained.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: To maximize the score or obtain the flag, the attacker needs to repeat the process of retrieving positions, calculating click coordinates, and making clicks.
StepDetails.Action: Repeat steps 3-5 until the game ends or the flag is obtained.
StepDetails.Result: The game ends or the flag is obtained.
